articles.description: Anwar Ali scored his first ever goal for the India against Hong Kong in the AFC Asian Cup qualifiers.
articles.content:
Anwar Ali has scored for India.
A footballer scoring for his national team is special alright, but it happens all the time. A right-footed centre-back finishing into the top corner with a half volle… [+2732 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Ishan Kishan involved in heated exchange with Tabraiz Shamsi in 3rd T20I - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tempers flared between Ishan Kishan and Tabraiz Shamsi after the India batter smacked a flat six off the South Africa spinner during the third T20I in Visakhapatnam on Tuesday.
